title: Mono
desc:
Post 1718
- Apply the **Ethereal** modifier to every card you own, except one.
- You cannot play, discard, or get rid of that specific non-**Ethereal** card until you have no **Ethereal** cards left.
- From now on, you no longer need to say UNO when you have no cards left. Nothing will happen if anyone tries to call UNO on you.
